name: @appsensorlike/appsensorlike
description: A port of OWASP AppSensor reference implementation

scripts.gen_server_config_schema: typescript-json-schema tsconfig.json --noExtraProps true --required true -o appsensor-server-config_schema.json IServerConfiguration
scripts.gen_client_config_schema: typescript-json-schema tsconfig.json --noExtraProps true --required true -o appsensor-client-config_schema.json ClientConfiguration
scripts.gen_logging_schema: typescript-json-schema tsconfig.json --noExtraProps true --required true -o appsensor-logging-config_schema.json LoggingConfiguration
